name: minimo
description:
“The odd colors and sharp angles of its minimal, code-generated graphics are eye-catching. Combined with the off-kilter music, they turn the game into a strange, abstract experience.”
7/10 – 148Apps

Small, simple, addictive.
The combination of endless runner and arcade shooter mechanics are accompanied by minimalistic, completely code generated graphics. The ever changing, atmospheric sound sphere adds depth to the minimo experience.
Minimo is challenging – yet rewarding. The highly responsive gameplay gives the player control to the max. The competition has already gotten tough at the Game Center.

Features:
- Game Center Leaderboards
- Simple tap controls
- Procedurally generated gameplay
- Music by Caramuerto
